1.0.name: wordpress/machform-shortcode
1.0.description:
MachForm is an excellent, easy to use form builder that you host on your own server or site. Until now, its been difficult and required "jumping through some hoops" to embed a form made with MachForm on your WordPress site. That is no more! You can now add a MachForm form anywhere on your site using a simple shortcode! Need a form in a blog post? Need a form on a page? No problem.

For more information, check out the plugin page on our website.

Features include:

  • Support for javascript based forms
  • Support for iframe based forms

How to use the shortcode:

  1. Click the "Code" option on your form inside of MachForm to see the embed codes.
  2. Make note of your form's "ID" and the "height".
  3. Use the shortcode to embed your form into your content using this format: [machform typ
